details.tip2: PARK.ONE launches SanChain (SANC). SANC/BTC, SANC/ETH trading pairs will be available.
details.tip6: Introduction: SanChain will integrate digital assets exchange with industries to establish a new blockchain ecosystem and become a part of Internet value. SAN ecosystem uses gas and underlying technology which drives DAPP and its development, achieving decentralization application and the integration of blockchain with business. With open sources, developers could establish new project to thrive the industrial application in blockchain technology. Currently, this project maintains strong growth momentum.
details.tip11: Risk Reminder: Investing in digital assets comes with high risks due to huge price fluctuations. Before investing, please have a full understanding of all the risks of investing in digital assets and be prudent of your own investment decisions.
